msbt.message: Remember how I was thinkin' of packing up and moving? Well, I changed my mind, .I had a little heart-to-heart with , and it came up that folks here really do like me.I needed to hear that. Anyway, I'm gonna stick here with my buddies!
You know how I've been wonderin' if it was time I moved on? Well, I've decided to stay.You can blame for sayin' how everyone wants me to stick around. I needed that.So yeah, ain't rid of me yet, !

I wanted to talk to you! You know how I told you I was thinking of moving? Well, that's off.I was starting to pack up when I ran into . Long story short, I got asked not to go.I'm gonna keep living the life a bit longer. Just wanted to tell you!

Heya. A while back, we talked about me moving away, remember? Well, I'm calling it off. I'm gonna stay put.'s really grown on me, and it kinda hit me how hard it'd be to leave it behind.Anyway, I'm glad I came to my senses. Now you're stuck with me, ! Bwa ha ha ha!
